title: What kind of virtual reality game do you hope they will work on the most?
body:
https://cdn57.androidauthority.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/minority_report-710x426.jpg
What kind of VR genre do you hope they will focus the most on
And release the most games for?

Fantasy games?
Sci-Fi games?
MMORPG game?
Mystery games?
Yolo games_ (Like I am bread)_
Race games?
Learning to drive XXXX _(Cars,pets,mounts,trains,people)_
War games?
Shooters?
Horror games?
Martial arts games?
Rule the world kind of games?
mehehehehehehehehehehe
